post.body: darn. I knew it was when I was a kid, but not the year. Wikipedia only european implementation dates.
a guy my friend was dating texted her pics of his toes. Somehow the penis is slighty less psycho. Are you Carrie Bradshaw?
I SAW sea turtles, I did not RAW them. Sea turtle soup is way bad mojo chica.
My existential question of the night:do I down the bottle, or show some restraint and stop at 3/4?
easy remedy to my previous confusion: Pronounce the D, if not the second T.
I get confused when @joeschmidt gets favrd cuz I've never followed him. I read the tweet and am like "how'd I miss that@joeschmitt tweet?
not that $7 wine out of a mug is all that bad, mind you
Note to self: next time, when getting dumped and moving out, pack wine glasses with the first trip. You will need them.
writing back the Big Boss, was typing "in a sec". Almost typed "in a sex". yikesies.
This photo has killed my love/lust for Brad Pitt. Perv-stache, EuropeanCarryall, blouse. You can keep him Angie! http://tinyurl.com/4vagt5
How did dumped people furnish their apartments before Craigslist? The classifieds?
you know there's some people who will just never give you a straight answer? Could you please make it so I never have to talk those people?
I, Drew Peterson, take this next victim, to have and to hold, in sickness and health, till her death do we part.
Will all you people who don't know how to operate the grocery store ATM please go back to 1983 and take a refresher course!
So hey, I just figured out that I'm 2ยบ of separation away from @BarakObama! I worked w/Nancy Sutley on border WQ. http://tinyurl.com/5jvdte
Ok, I need to snap out of it. I forgot to eat a chocolate cupcake I got two days ago. A chocolate cupcake!!
CA water wonky types will be interested in this: http://tinyurl.com/yo7q8m/c/a/2008/12/16/MNDD14OIOF.DTL
i'm a monogamous mindfuckee though, so no propositions merci.
yeah! going to hang out with boyfriend who dumped me who I refuse to call my ex. because I love a good mind fuck.
I keep telling ppl that I'm done with my xmas shopping. I don't know this is actually the case, but the denial is saving me tons of anxiety.
Dear Girl Yapping Full Volume in the Cube Hall: No one cares about your "JLo Sweater". Your JLo ass, maybe, your sweater, no.
Thoughts on Christianity, inspired by Hawaii: if the Church used toasted coconut wafers as the body of Christ, there might be more devotees.
Whoa, sun is frying my belly & it's raining on my back. Like being in 2 time zones, or ecozones or whatchmacallit zones. Or just on Kauai!
Just raw sea turtles while snorkeling. Glee!
My belly is full of bbq pork & kimchee, & i'm on a kauai beach. Later i'll have a cocktail 4 my twitter friends. Did i mention it's 70F?
off to Kauai! don't wait up!
with Ken!
I'm going to Kauai, I'm going to Kauai!
75% are glad that W is leaving. The other 25% are still hung up on that Terri Schiavo controversy and think that Barak might pull the plug?
Dog ppl who bring their dogs to off leash areas, then keep their dogs on leash and jump btwn their dog & others are fucking weird.
Cops busted 3 kids robbing presents from under the tree at Ken's mom's. She doesn't lock her door. Lock yer doors ppl, this isn't Canada.
Did ya miss me?
Downstairs neighbor is rockin' the karaoke machine. I am rather amused! And glad for sleeping pills.
SF Mayor Newsom signs $1.9 billion bill for Hetch Hetchy improvements. Job security for this girl. http://tinyurl.com/3zsrro
My dog and my cat became friends today. Fear the rapture, for it is near.
Wonder if I can find the guy who sold me my 1st (only) acid. Him: "how much do you want?" Me:Never done it. Him:DROP DROP DROP. Me: Ohshit!
I keep hoping I will come across that scrawny stoner I was obsessed with and realize that he was nothing more than a scrawny stoner.
It turns out, if I knew you a decade ago an we didn't keep in touch, I probably do not remember your last name.
Trawling facebook for college friends. Am making fun of people's names. Yes, the girl named Summer is making fun of OTHER PEOPLE's names.
OMG that girl does NOT have a pic of her breastfeeding as her Facebook profile pic. TOO MUCH LIBERATION PEOPLE.
